verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) "Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H7227><s%> they have persecuted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%> up," Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H559><s%>
"Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H7227><s%> they have persecuted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%> up; Yet <S%H1571><s%> they have not prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against me.
"The plowers <S%H9177><s%> plowed <S%H9177><s%> upon my back; <S%H1354><s%> They lengthened <S%H748><s%> their furrows. <S%H4618><s%>"
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is righteous; <S%H6662><s%> He has cut <S%H7112><s%> in two <S%H7112><s%> the cords <S%H5688><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
May all <S%H3605><s%> who hate <S%H8130><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Be put <S%H954><s%> to shame <S%H954><s%> and turned <S%H5472><s%> backward, <S%H268><s%>
Let them be like grass <S%H2682><s%> upon the housetops, <S%H1406><s%> Which <S%H7945><s%> withers <S%H3001><s%> before <S%H6927><s%> it grows <S%H8025><s%> up;
With which <S%H7945><s%> the reaper <S%H7114><s%> does not fill <S%H4390><s%> his hand, <S%H3709><s%> Or the binder <S%H6014><s%> of sheaves <S%H6014><s%> his bosom; <S%H2683><s%>

Nor <S%H3808><s%> do those who pass <S%H5674><s%> by say, <S%H559><s%> "The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be upon you; We bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
